summary: THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER TO HAVE THE IGNITION SWITCH RECALL (#02V120000) PERFORMED.  THE TECHNICIAN ADVISED THE CONSUMER THAT THE DEALER WOULD CHARGE LABOR BECAUSE IT WAS NECESSARY TO REMOVE AND REINSTALL THE VEHICLE SECURITY SYSTEM BECAUSE IT WAS NOT A MANUFACTURER INSTALLED SYSTEM.  *MR    *SCC   *NLM
